rows.label: qev097801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Do you have a minute? ...Er, sorry, silly question.
You're here, so of course you're free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm Milly. I was sent out to this caravan as
part of our treaty with the Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0003
rows.name:
And yes, I'm aware that I got saddled with a job
nobody else wanted...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0004
rows.name:
But this alliance is really important, so somebody had
to play ambassador.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0005
rows.name:
And the Nopon are pretty fun, once you get to know
them. I suppose I've grown attached in my own way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0006
rows.name:
Anyway, my point is... What was my point? Oh! Right.
I've got something I need another BLADE's help with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0007
rows.name: One for all and all for one, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0008
rows.name:
So there's someone in the caravan who's been sick for
ages.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0009
rows.name:
It'd be nice if I could help with some human medical
know-how, but there's one problem...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0010
rows.name:
With all of us in mimeosomes these days, our medical
tech is closer to mechanic work. Doesn't really apply to
xenos, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0011
rows.name: But I got to thinking...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'll bet there's data on organic medicine stored in those
pieces of the Lifehold that New LA is looking for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0013
rows.name:
If we could find some, it's possible we could treat
some of the conditions the Nopon currently think
are incurable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0014
rows.name:
I don't have the faintest idea where to look, but...
do you think you could give searching a try?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev097801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Milly about the patient's condition.

rows.label: qev097801_JNK0020
rows.name: Request

rows.label: qev097801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Milly if you can meet the patient.

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0015
rows.name: She's bedridden in that tent out back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0016
rows.name:
I don't get the impression she's on death's door,
but it's still not a good situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0017
rows.name:
She hasn't been able to be up and about since long
before I came here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0018
rows.name: Poor thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0019
rows.name: She's sleeping in the tent out back there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0021
rows.name: I'm not sure I can get you in to see her, though...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0022
rows.name:
As a race, Nopon are pretty oblivious about illness,
but they still get overprotective when someone's sick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0023
rows.name:
It was only after they really got to know me that they
even told me about all this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0024
rows.name:
Having just met you today, I don't know that they'll
want you to see her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0025
rows.name:
But can I assume from your concern that you're willing
to take on the job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Thanks so much. And good luck tracking down that
medical data![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0027
rows.name: I'll keep my fingers crossed here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0028
rows.name: Honestly, I've been pretty surprised.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0029
rows.name: I get along REALLY well with the Nopon here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'd want to stick around and be friends with them even
without the whole goodwill-ambassador...treaty...
delegate...thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0031
rows.name:
Which is also why I want to help them find a cure.
It's hard to watch a friend suffer, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097801_MSG0032
rows.name:
So good luck finding a piece of the Lifehold which has
that medical data I need in it![ST:wait ]
